channel.title: Away until
channel.description: This is a feature on MyBB and I think it would be a neat little addition to our forum profiles. It'd just be a custom profile field that would say "Away until: ..." and you could enter a certain date. Thoughts?

item.title: Away until
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“John, post:10, topic:541396”]Has anyone here ever used the administrative panel in SMF? All this requires is a custom profile field which is a built in feature.[/quote]That would be even more pointless, at least the MyBB option does things based on whether or not you are away

Read full topic

item.title: Away until
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

Has anyone here ever used the administrative panel in SMF? All this requires is a custom profile field which is a built in feature.

item.title: Away until
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

I can barely tell if you guys are actually hating on Tom at this point…

OT: I wouldn’t see a use for it but it shouldn’t be much trouble if someone from the community decided to make it.

Read full topic

item.description:

I think a large part of it is that not everybody CAN make it really, we’re a java programming community mainly

item.title: Away until
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:6, topic:541396”][quote author=Pure_ link=topic=660266.msg4414950#msg4414950 date=1395444130]
Instead of these posts can you all contribute to the open-source project on github?
[/quote]They still need to be discussed first…[/quote]Most threads seem to be the same. We agree on the content then nobody does it. I think the discussions are pretty pointless without real initiative from the community.

Read full topic
